Detailed Description

Provides various utility methods.

Function Documentation

DLL_API FIABITMAP DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_AddBorder ( FIBITMAP *  src,
int  border 
)

Adds a border to an image.

This function returns an image with a black (zero) border added to an image.

Parameters:
src FIBITMAP bitmap to add a border to.
border Size of the border.
Returns:
A FIABITMAP structure containing a FIBITMAP and a border size.

DLL_API int DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_BitwiseCompare ( FIBITMAP *  dib1,
FIBITMAP *  dib2 
)

Performs a bitwise compare between two images. Returns 1 for images that are the same.

Parameters:
dib1 first FIBITMAP bitmap.
dib2 second FIBITMAP bitmap.

DLL_API FIBITMAP* DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_CloneImageType ( FIBITMAP *  src,
int  width,
int  height 
)

Clones an image type.

This function clones the type not the image data. Ie it clones the bpp, pitch etc.

Parameters:
src FIBITMAP bitmap to clone.
width Width of the bitmap.
height Height of the bitmap.

DLL_API FIBITMAP* DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_FloatThreshold ( FIBITMAP *  src,
float  t,
BYTE  min,
BYTE  max 
)

Thresholds a float image.

Converts a bitmap to 8-bit monochrome bitmap ie values of 0 and 255 using a threshold T between [0.0..].

Parameters:
src Image to threshold.
t Value to threshold on
min Value that pixels below t are set to.
max Value that pixels above and equal to t are set to.
Returns:
FIBITMAP 8bit fi bitmap with pixel values between min and max.

DLL_API int DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_Is16BitReally12BitImage ( FIBITMAP *  src  ) 

Return 1 if a 16bit image is really 12bit.

Parameters:
src FIBITMAP bitmap.

DLL_API int DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_IsGreyScale ( FIBITMAP *  src  ) 

Returns 1 if the FIBITMAP is a greyscale image.

This function returns 0 for 16 bit and higher colour images. It returns 1 for greyscale images or palettised images. Note the palatte could be colour so be careful.

Parameters:
src FIBITMAP bitmap.
